mapper.select: select table_name as tableName, table_comment as tableComment, (data_length+index_length)/1024 as tableSize from information_schema.tables where table_schema=#{dbName} and ( table_type='BASE TABLE' or table_type='SYSTEM VIEW' );

select column_name as colName,column_default as colDefault, is_nullable as nullAble,data_type as dataType, character_maximum_length as charMLength, column_type as colType,column_key as colKey, column_comment as colComment from information_schema.columns where table_schema=#{dbName} and table_name='user_info' order by ordinal_position;
